thread.section_title: Project Management Academy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Project Management Academy | projectmanagementacademy.net
thread.title: Jonathan Clark
thread.title_full: Project Management Academy reviewed by Jonathan Clark

author: Jonathan Clark
title: Jonathan Clark
text: Project Management Academy offers a wide range of study guides and practice questions. ALL of them were helpful in getting me prepared for my PMP exam. I am not a good standardized test taker but the practice questions, timed tests, and exam tips and tricks provided all helped and made me feel relaxed when I took my exam. I have already recommended Project Management Academy to co-workers and friends.
